column3:
フルーツ畑を作ろうと頑張っていたティクル
しかし水場にゴミがたまり
作業がいっこうに進まず困っているようだ
ゴミを捨てた犯人とは一体…
column4:
Dalia has been working hard to start an orchard,
but garbage keeps appearing in her water
source, so her efforts are all for naught.
What sort ofvile polluter would toss his or her
garbage away with such indifference?

column3:
キャリバンからもらったイチゴを植えたティクル
イチゴができたら自由にとってよいそうだ

水場もキレイになり
あとはイチゴが出来るのを待つだけだ
column4:
Dalia planted the wildberries she received from
Calyban and said that it's OK to pick them
once they grow in.

With the source of the water pollution cleared
up, all that's left to do is wait for the wildberries
to grow.

column3:
水場にゴミがたまり水が使えなくなってしまった
原因は水路の上流でメロンを食べ散らす女性だった
女性はゲルド高地の雪原地帯でしか手に入らない
貴重なイチゴを10個"持ってくるなら
食べるのをやめても良いという…
column4:
The water source got polluted with garbage, so
the water has become unusable. The cause
turned out to be a woman throwing melon rinds
away in the waterway upstream. She says if you
bring her10 wildberriesfrom the snow-topped
peaks of the Gerudo Highlands, she'll stop
eating so many melons...

column3:
水場にゴミがたまり水が使えなくなってしまった
原因は水路の上流でメロンを食べ散らす女性だった
イチゴ10個と引き換えに
メロンを食べることをやめてもらった
これで水場からゴミもなくなることだろう

早速 ティクルに報告しにいこう
column4:
The water source was polluted with garbage, so
the water became unusable. The cause turned
out to be a woman throwing melon rinds away
in the waterway upstream. In exchange for 10
wildberries, she agreed to stop eating melons.
Maybe the water will clear up now.

Hurry back and report to Dalia.
